ep02.name: "The Gang Hits the Road"
ep02.description: "The gang tries to expand their horizons by going on a road trip to the Grand Canyon."

ep03.name: "The Great Recession"
ep03.description: "With a shantytown taking shape outside, Mac and Dennis try to keep Paddy's going in tough times. Meanwhile, Frank and Dee start a family business."

ep04.name: "The Gang Gives Frank an Intervention"
ep04.description: "Frank's behavior is more bizarre than usual---so bizarre that even the gang notice---so they decide to stage an intervention."

ep05.name: "The Waitress Is Getting Married"
ep05.description: "The waitress is getting married, Dee is jealous that she's beating her to the altar, so she tries to derail the wedding."

ep06.name: "The World Series Defense"
ep06.description: "The gang describes the trials and tribulations they went through, during game five of the World Series, in hopes the judge will clear them of all the citations they received."

ep07.name: "The Gang Wrestles for the Troops"
ep07.description: "The gang puts together a wrestling show for returning troops. Meanwhile, Dee finally meets the soldier that she has been communicating with over the internet."

ep08.name: "Paddy's Pub: Home of the Original Kitten Mittens"
ep08.description: "The gang decides to expand their business by developing a number of products that they could sell at Paddy's pub."

ep09.name: "Mac and Dennis Break Up"
ep09.description: "Mac and Dennis decide that they need to spend some time away from each other. Meanwhile, Charlie helps Dee search for her cat."

ep10.name: "The D.E.N.N.I.S. System"
ep10.description: "Dennis reveals his foolproof system for seducing any woman to the rest of the gang, but they don't grasp the concept."

ep11.name: "Mac and Charlie Write a Movie"
ep11.description: "When Dee gets a part in the new M. Night Shyamalan film, Mac and Charlie seize a chance to pitch their movie script."

ep12.name: "The Gang Reignites the Rivalry"
ep12.description: "After being banned for 10 years from a local drinking competition appropriately named \"Flipadelphia,\" the gang tries to reignite their old rivalry with another local bar. Finding that they are in need of some serious practice, the guys head to Dennis' old fraternity house at the University of Pennsylvania to get their game up to speed while Dee hones her skills on her own. Frank wears skinny pants."

ep12.name: "Dee Gives Birth"
ep12.description: "Dee's blessed event is fast approaching but the father's identity remains a mystery---to the gang, at least. So they throw a party and invite all of Dee's former flings."

ep01.name: "Mac Fights Gay Marriage"
ep01.description: "Mac defends traditional marriage, while the rest of the gang reaps the rewards of wedded bliss."

ep02.name: "Dennis Gets Divorced"
ep02.description: "Marital bliss turns into business, as the gang experiences the emotional and economic hardships of divorce."

ep03.name: "The Gang Buys a Boat"
ep03.description: "The gang attempts to find adventure on the sea after they purchase their 'new' boat."

ep04.name: "Mac's Big Break"
ep04.description: "Mac finally gets his big break after correctly answering a trivia question on the radio. While Frank, Dennis, and Dee take their bar-banter to the internet with their own podcast."

ep05.name: "Mac and Charlie: White Trash"
ep05.description: "Rejected from a pool club, Mac and Charlie set out fix an abandoned pool to help cope with the Philly heat wave. Meanwhile, Dennis and Dee go about dealing with the heat in a different way."

ep06.name: "Mac's Mom Burns Her House Down"
ep06.description: "Mac's mother is left homeless after she burns down her house, which leaves Charlie and Mac with no choice but to make new living arrangements; when Dee feels under the weather, Frank tries to muster his paternal instincts to care for her."

ep07.name: "Who Got Dee Pregnant?"
ep07.description: "The gang gets a real scare after Dee reveals she's pregnant, forcing the guys to recall their last hazy Halloween party to determine who the father is."

ep08.name: "The Gang Gets a New Member"
ep08.description: "A blast from the past prompts the guys to expand membership, and Dee to re-consider her future."

ep09.name: "Dee Reynolds: Shaping America's Youth"
ep09.description: "Motivated by the drama teacher who inspired her, Dee takes a job as a substitute teacher, and exposes her students to the culture of Paddy's with a field trip to see the Gang's take on the Lethal Weapon series: Lethal Weapon 5."

ep10.name: "Charlie Kelly: King of the Rats"
ep10.description: "Keeping the basement rodent-free drives Charlie to the brink. The gang throws Charlie a surprise party."

ep11.name: "The Gang Gets Stranded in the Woods"
ep11.description: "En route to Atlantic City for a charity event, Mac, Frank and Dee get lost. Meanwhile, Dennis and Charlie hitch a ride to town."

ep01.name: "Frank's Pretty Woman"
ep01.description: "With Frank intent on marrying a prostitute, The Gang tries to make the best of it by attempting an image makeover to uncover the heart of gold that exists deep inside Frank’s “pretty woman.”"

ep02.name: "The Gang Goes to the Jersey Shore"
ep02.description: "Dee and Dennis take the gang to their favorite childhood vacation spot where things aren't quite how they remember. While Dee and Dennis see the seedy side of the Jersey Shore, Mac, Frank and Charlie have the nights of their lives."

ep03.name: "Frank Reynolds' Little Beauties"
ep03.description: "Frank finds himself in the child beauty-pageant business and fears that people might think that he's in it for the wrong reasons. Meanwhile, Dee wages war on stage moms, and Mac, Dennis and Charlie think they have found a contestant to back."

ep04.name: "Sweet Dee Gets Audited"
ep04.description: "Dee faces an IRS audit over her claim that the baby she carried as a surrogate is her dependent, while the guys decide to run the bar in an unemotional, democratic manner rather than their typical method of shouting and personal attacks."

ep05.name: "Frank's Brother"
ep05.description: "When Frank's long lost brother Gino shows up at the bar, the two of them tell the gang about the jazz club they ran in the 1960s and 70s, and how they fell out over Shadynasty, a singer who was the love of both of their lives."

ep06.name: "The Storm of the Century"
ep06.description: "As a hurricane threatens Philadelphia, Mac, Dennis and Charlie go to a mall to buy supplies and check out the large breasted TV reporter broadcasting from there, while Frank and Dee prepare Paddy's, and its basement bunker, for the storm."

ep07.name: "Chardee MacDennis: The Game of Games"
ep07.description: "The gang plays the most twisted board game ever. Dee and Dennis face Mac, Charlie and Frank."

ep08.name: "The ANTI-Social Network"
ep08.description: "The gang uses the Internet to cyber-stalk their prey. Frank tries to drum up business for Paddy's with a viral video."

ep09.name: "The Gang Gets Trapped"
ep09.description: "The Gang's plan to \"extract\" an \"artifact\" from a residence is jeopardized when the owners turn out to be home. Having not been noticed on the way in, they must make a plan to get the same result for the way out."

ep10.name: "How Mac Got Fat"
ep10.description: "Step inside the confession booth with Mac as he tells a befuddled priest why his fatness is the fault of the other members of The Gang."

ep11.name: "Thunder Gun Express"
ep11.description: "Traffic problems as a result of the President's visit to Philadelphia makes it difficult for the gang to see the summer's biggest film, \"Thunder Gun Express\"."

ep12.name: "The High School Reunion (1)"
ep12.description: "The gang have much to prove when they attend their high-school reunion. They meet old friends and make new foes as they stroll down memory lane."

ep13.name: "The High School Reunion (2): The Gang's Revenge"
ep13.description: "The gang come up with a new plan to buff their tarnished high-school reputations at their reunion."

ep01.name: "Pop-Pop: The Final Solution"
ep01.description: "Dennis and Dee's ailing grandfather Pop-Pop is wasting away in the hospital, and they have to decide whether or not to pull the plug. But things get complicated when The Gang learns of Pop-Pop's history as a Nazi, and Mac, Charlie and Frank set off in search of the old man's spoils from the war."

ep02.name: "The Gang Recycles Their Trash"
ep02.description: "With the garbage men of Philadelphia on strike, Frank concocts a plan to undercut the union and get the contract to collect the city's trash."

ep03.name: "The Maureen Ponderosa Wedding Massacre"
ep03.description: "The gang make a disturbing discovery after crashing Maureen's wedding."

ep04.name: "Charlie and Dee Find Love"
ep04.description: "Charlie and Dee become romantically involved with two members of a wealthy family, which arouses jealousy in Mac, Dennis and Frank."

ep05.name: "The Gang Gets Analyzed"
ep05.description: "The Gang gets Freudian as they step into the therapist's office to work through their mountain of issues, but when Dennis thinks he has everyone figured out, the shrink turns the tables on him and exposes the insanity in his unique brand of pop psychology."

ep06.name: "Charlie's Mom Has Cancer"
ep06.description: "Mac, Charlie and Dee struggle with their faith as Charlie's mom fights cancer. Meanwhile, Frank loses his memory amidst a search for buried treasure."

ep07.name: "Frank's Back in Business"
ep07.description: "With Charlie under his wing, Frank cleans up so he can get his hands dirty and help out his old company with one last big merger. An unwritten rule of the bar gets the rest of the gang caught up in a case of mistaken identity."

ep08.name: "Charlie Rules the World"
ep08.description: "After slipping into an unhealthy obsession with computer games, The Gang wrestles to define the difference between the real and the virtual worlds."

ep09.name: "The Gang Dines Out"
ep09.description: "Every member of The Gang has something to celebrate at Guigino's, Philly's finest eatery, but when Mac and Dennis' private dinner is interrupted by an unexpected sighting of Frank and Charlie, the in-fighting begins. Dee also turns up at a table for one, and over the course of the night, the \"one-ups-manship\" soars to new heights."

ep10.name: "Reynolds vs. Reynolds: The Cereal Defense"
ep10.description: "Court is in session at Paddy's Pub as Frank and Dennis present their cases to the rest of the gang, resulting in a verdict that will change their lives FOREVER... but not really."

ep01.name: "The Gang Broke Dee"
ep01.description: "The gang attempts to cheer up a deeply depressed Dee, realizing they are the cause for her predicament."

ep02.name: "Gun Fever Too: Still Hot"
ep02.description: "After Frank appears on Local Television advocating gun ownership, the rest of the gang takes a look at the ownership process and alternatives to find a common ground on this still heated issue."

ep03.name: "The Gang Tries Desperately to Win an Award"
ep03.description: "Tired of failing to be recognized for their years of service in the bar industry, the gang changes their ways to give the patrons what they think they want."

ep04.name: "Mac and Dennis Buy a Timeshare"
ep04.description: "The gang does their best to recoup their investments in questionable schemes by dumping their losses on Ben the soldier while trying to avoid being duped again by whatever mastermind is pulling their strings."

ep05.name: "Mac Day"
ep05.description: "Everyone in the gang gets a day to do what they want while everyone else in the gang must participate willingly. This is Mac's Day... and its got twice the \"Mac\"."

ep06.name: "The Gang Saves the Day"
ep06.description: "A routine trip to a convenience store places the gang in the middle of an armed robbery."

ep07.name: "The Gang Gets Quarantined"
ep07.description: "The gang voluntarily quarantine themselves inside of Paddy's in an attempt to keep their singing voices pristine for an upcoming competition when a severe flu outbreak sweeps Philadelphia."

ep08.name: "Flowers for Charlie"
ep08.description: "When an experiment successfully multiplies Charlie's intellect and takes him away from the bar, the rest of the gang find themselves struggling to complete the menial \"Charlie Work\" that has kept the bar running for so long."

ep09.name: "The Gang Makes Lethal Weapon 6"
ep09.description: "After creative differences over what constitutes tasteful nudity cause Frank to pull his money out of \"Lethal Weapon 6\" during filming, Mac, Dennis, and Charlie screen their rough footage for investors in hopes of raising enough capital to finish the production of their latest masterpiece."

ep10.name: "The Gang Squashes Their Beefs"
ep10.description: "When some bad blood with old foes compromises their ideal Thanksgiving, the gang decides to make amends by breaking bread with those they've hurt."
